About Me

BIOGRAPHY

I'm interested to work in the field of software and web development as a Full-Stack Web Developer. Constantly trying to extend and improve my coding knowledge and skills by taking various courses, exchanging experiences with other developers and building simulations of different projects (websites and apps). Currently working as a Manager of Legal service, with a Law Master Degree, for a firm in the field of the publishing industry.

Skills and Experience:

Most experiance with:

- JavaScript(ES6), HTML(HTML5), CSS(CSS3)

Actively using:

- React.js, Redux, Vue.js jQuery, Bootstramp, Sass for Front-End development

- Node.js, Express, MongoDB for Back-End development

Also have some knowlage of:

- JAVA, MYSQL

Actively using also:

- GIT, Firebase, Adobe Photoshop, WordPress

- The Institute for Textbooks and Educational Resources -

Expert Associate for Legal Affairs (2012-2019)

Manager of Legal service (2019 - Still working)

Conducting research on relevant laws, regulations, and legal articles, Organizing and maintaining documents in a paper or electronic filing systems, Gathering, arranging legal documents, writing reports and case preparation, Drafting correspondence and legal documents, such as contracts and other legal acts, Representing the company in a court, Anticipating and mitigating potential legal problems involving the company, Gathering, arranging and drafting legal documents for Public Procurement procedures.

I organize work and distribution of business obligations in the legal service of the firm. Gained working discipline, organizational abilities, working under pressure and in cooperation with other people.

- Developer job preparations -

Full-Stack Web Developer (2018 - In process of learning)

Currently trying to improve my coding knowledge and skills by creating various projects for practicing and for a demonstration of gained skills. Also working on pro bono projects.

Constantly connecting with other developers with similar interests for reasons of exchanging experiences, working with them on projects and training cooperation with other coders.

In my current job and profession it's constantly needed to correspond and work with other people, so gained skills in that field I will transfer to coding.

In the pursuit of freelancing jobs and also willing to work for contractors in the country and abroad on part-time or full-time jobs and projects.
